description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You attempt a check to remove or counteract an effect with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Controlled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] conditions

Effect You roll twice and use the better result.
